pfValidation
directive in module patternfly

Description

Directive used for input validation based on custom function.

Usage

as element:
<pf-validation
       [pf-validation-disabled="{expression}"]>
</pf-validation>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
pfValidationDisabled
(optional)
expression

If true, the validation is disabled, it is enabled otherwise.
